text: E'i masa pichiye deyara kaja kebala kupharira matra brd'dhi kare, yara phale kapheragana gomarahite patita haya. Era halala kare neya eke eka bachara ebam harama kare neya an'ya bachara, yate tara ganana purna kare neya allahara nisid'dha masagulora. Atahpara halala kare neya allahara haramakrta masaguloke. Tadera mandakajagulo tadera jan'ye sobhaniya kare deya hala. Ara allaha kaphera sampradayake hedayeta karena na.
